description: From Middle French laxatif, from Latin laxātīvus (literally “relaxing, loosening”).

adjectives.description: laxative (comparative more laxative, superlative most laxative)

entries.meaning: Having the effect of moving the bowels, or aiding digestion and preventing constipation.
Any substance, such as a food or in the form of a medicine which has a laxative effect.
